Text:
saitanh, your point? This game is good.  Much like playing turn based battletech on the PC.
Don't be such a superficial little nutsack.
Anyone can seed this game, please? I've been searching it for a while!!!
Agreed, crossmr. Too many noobs these days can't recognise a good game if it didn't have 64x FSAA @ 2048x2048 and hit them between the legs with a jousting lance.
Guys, grab the class rip-prtti.ace (32Mb) from the edk network (use the latest emule plus) - rip = no intro, or grab the 470Mb cue/bin pair marked razor1911/x-gamers/sharereactor.

This games ownz0rz j00. None of that kiddy "class C, class B, class A, class S" Final Fantasy kiddy style progression shit - HUNDREDS of mechs or design your own. Your pilots even gain exp and increase skills.
If you loved the tabletop or the Battletech game, this game will rock your world, it gets a fucking A on all counts. Too bad no big budget.
seed please. ugh noobs can never appericate good games. im wit crossmr and nakat_1.

Requesting a Re-seed of this Torrent from anyone who has it, this game has disappeared from the web.

just so you all know, matrix games released that game as a FREE download game. The full game (aviable for download) is hosted by strategy informer. (http://www.strategyinformer.com/pc/others/titansofsteelwarringsuns/other.html)

Just wanted you to know, the game has not disappeared from the net
